quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the Marvel Cinematic Universe!

questions.question: Who was the main villain in 'Avengers: Infinity War'?
questions.explanation: Thanos, the Mad Titan, was the main antagonist in 'Avengers: Infinity War' as he sought to collect all the Infinity Stones.

questions.question: What is the name of Tony Stark's AI assistant in the Iron Man suits?
questions.explanation: J.A.R.V.I.S. (Just A Rather Very Intelligent System) is Tony Stark's AI assistant and was later integrated into Vision.

questions.question: What material is Thor's enchanted hammer, Mjölnir, made of?
questions.explanation: Thor's enchanted hammer, Mjölnir, is made of the Asgardian metal known as Uru.

questions.question: What is the name of Black Panther's homeland?
questions.explanation: Black Panther's homeland, a technologically advanced African nation, is called Wakanda.

questions.question: What is the real name of the hero known as Black Widow?
questions.explanation: The real name of the hero Black Widow, portrayed by Scarlett Johansson, is Natasha Romanoff.

questions.question: In 'Guardians of the Galaxy,' what is the name of the criminal group led by Star-Lord?
questions.explanation: The Ravagers, led by Yondu Udonta, are the criminal group that Star-Lord, also known as Peter Quill, is associated with.

questions.question: What was the first Marvel Cinematic Universe movie to be released?
questions.explanation: 'Iron Man,' released in 2008, was the first movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

questions.question: What is the name of the alien race that Loki belongs to?
questions.explanation: Loki, the adopted brother of Thor, belongs to the Frost Giants, an alien race from Jotunheim.

questions.question: What is the name of the artifact that holds the Space Stone?
questions.explanation: The Tesseract is the cube-shaped artifact that contains the Space Stone, which grants the power of teleportation.

questions.question: Which MCU movie features the villain Hela, the Goddess of Death?
questions.explanation: Hela, the Goddess of Death and Thor's sister, is the main antagonist in the movie 'Thor: Ragnarok.'

questions.question: In 'Spider-Man: Homecoming,' who is revealed to be the Vulture, the movie's main antagonist?
questions.explanation: Adrian Toomes, played by Michael Keaton, is revealed to be the Vulture, the main antagonist in 'Spider-Man: Homecoming.'

questions.question: Which character's alter ego is Scott Lang?
questions.explanation: Scott Lang is the alter ego of the superhero Ant-Man, who can shrink in size and communicate with ants.

questions.question: In 'Captain America: Civil War,' which hero's actions lead to the implementation of the Sokovia Accords?
questions.explanation: Scarlet Witch, also known as Wanda Maximoff, accidentally causes civilian casualties in a mission, leading to the Sokovia Accords.

questions.question: Which movie features the mystical city of Kamar-Taj and the introduction of the Time Stone?
questions.explanation: The movie 'Doctor Strange' introduces the mystical city of Kamar-Taj and the Time Stone, one of the Infinity Stones.

questions.question: What is the name of the ancient civilization that built the advanced city of Atlantis in the MCU?
questions.explanation: In the MCU, the Asgardians, a powerful race of beings, are responsible for the construction of the advanced city of Atlantis.
